questions.text: Leading questions may be asked by defense lawyer in
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (B)

Leading questions are allowed only in cross examination. Cross examination is done to refute or counter the testimony of the plaintiff

questions.text: Death happens in operation theatre due to the negligence of the doctor. The doctor may be punished under
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (C)

Negligence causing death is punishable under 106 BNS

questions.text: Which amongst the following is not a test for blood stain
questions.solution: Correct Answer (D)

questions.text: Bluish green discoloration of the walls of blood vessels in 48 hours of death is due to which compound
questions.solution: Correct Answer (B)

questions.text: Identify
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (D)

Filigree burns are seen in lightning injuries. 
Staining is seen over the dependent parts of the body. The same is absent over the pressure areas, hence can be differentiated from contusion.

choices.text: Operate without consent as the patient is critical
Take consent from relatives and operate
Refer the patient to another hospital

questions.text: What is the duty of a doctor if a patient refuses consent for procedure in an emergency?
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (A)

Medicolegal duty involves informing the police. By making a MLC, the doctor informs police. Medical duty involves treatment of the patient which cannot be done as the patient is conscious and refusing to consent.

questions.text: The age of juvenile in conflict with law, in absence of age proof, is determined by a board of doctors. Which doctor does not constitute this board.
questions.solution: Correct Answer (C)

questions.text: Giving false evidence under oath is punishable under
questions.solution: Correct Answer (B)

questions.text: In a case of infanticide, to determine live born, which is the correct sequence of opening the body for dissection?
questions.solution: Correct Answer (B)

questions.text: Which of the following cannot be determined from femur found at the crime scene
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (D)

All of these characteristics can be determined from femur found at the crime scene.

questions.text: What will be the age of an individual with 6 permanent teeth and one temporary tooth in one quadrant in oral cavity.
questions.solution: Correct Answer (C)

questions.text: Sodium fluoride is used as a preservative in which poisoning
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (D)

Sodium fluoride is used in Alcohol, Carbon monoxide, Cyanide and Cocaine poisoning

questions.text: Drug of choice for arsenic poisoning is
questions.solution: Correct Answer (A)

questions.text: Activated charcoal may be used in the treatment of
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (C)

The only heavy metal where activated charcoal can be used in Mercury. It is contraindicated in all other heavy metal poisonings.

choices.text: Stab injury over abdomen upto Rectus

questions.text: Which of the following is a grievous hurt
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (B)

Section 116 BNS – 
Clause 5 - Destruction or Permanent impairment of power of member or joint

questions.text: A female commits suicide due to the repeated demands of dowry by husband. The autopsy shall be done under which section
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (D)

In case of dowry death, enquiry is done by magistrate (Sec 196 BNSS).

choices.text: Oblique ligature mark on the neck

questions.text: Which of the following suggests antemortem hanging
questions.solution: Correct Answer (B)

questions.text: Determine the range of the firearm
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (D)

No singeing, blackening and tattooing is present. The red coloured ring is Abrasion collar
 
RANGE OF FIREARM

questions.text: Calculate the burnt area for an adult female with burns over right side of front of chest and abdomen, front of right upper limb, and front of right lower limb.
questions.solution: Correct Answer (B)

questions.text: Identify the given skull fracture
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (B)

Gutter fracture is caused due to bullets

questions.text: Punch drunk syndrome is seen due to rupture of
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (C)

Punch drunk syndrome is seen in boxers associated with sub dural hemorrhage which is caused by rupture of cortical bridging veins.

questions.text: What is the correct order of enzyme elevation in tissue injury 1. Aminopeptidase 2. ATPase 3. Cathepsin 4. Histamine
questions.solution: Correct Answer (D)

questions.text: Which dye is used for detection of fat embolism in lung tissue
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (B)

Scharlack R is Sudan IV

questions.text: Match column A with column B
questions.solution: Correct Answer (B)

questions.text: Cause of death in Café coronary is
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (C)

It is due to stimulation of superior laryngeal nerve endings where an intoxicated person aspirates a bolus of food in larynx.

questions.text: Which is not a constituent of typical embalming fluid
questions.solution: Correct Answer (B)

questions.text: Identify the injury
questions.solution: Correct Answer (A)

questions.text: Which of the following is correct regarding shock wave
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (A)

Blast/shock waves are highly directional. It damages the internal organs.

questions.text: Which dye is used to examine a rape victim
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (C)

1% toluidine blue is used to stain micro lacerations that are not visible to naked eye.

choices.text: In case of chromosomal abnormalities, pregnancy can be terminated anytime
In case of failure of contraception, pregnancy can be terminated till 24 weeks
In case of forceful intercourse by husband resulting in conception, pregnancy can be terminated till 24 weeks

questions.text: Which is true regarding Medical Termination of Pregnancy Act
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (D)

MTP act was amended in 2021. Recent supreme court ruling in 2022 has allowed termination in case of chromosomal abnormalities irrespective of the period of gestation.

questions.text: A child under legal guardianship attains majority at
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (C)

As per the Indian majority act, the person under legal guardianship attains majority at 21 years.

questions.text: Hymen is commonly ruptured in what position due to sexual intercourse?
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (C)

Due to sexual intercourse, hymen commonly tears at 6 o’clock. Due to masturbation, hymen commonly tears at 12 o’clock position.

questions.text: Identify
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (A)

These castor seeds (Ricinus Communis) contain the active principle Ricin which is a Toxalbumin.

questions.text: In which poisoning, Envelope shaped crystals are seen in the urine?
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (D)

In Ethylene glycol and Oxalic acid poisoning, calcium oxalate crystals are seen in urine which are envelope shaped.

choices.text: Most common tube used in adults is Ryles tube
Best position for doing gastric lavage is supine position
Kerosene poisoning is an absolute contraindication for doing gastric lavage
Lavage fluid should be preserved for chemical analysis

questions.text: Which of the following is true about gastric lavage
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (D)

Kerosene poisoning is a relative contraindication for doing gastric lavage. The only absolute contraindication is corrosive poisoning.

questions.text: Which declaration is the ‘Modernized version of Hippocratic oath’
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (C)

Oslo – Therapeutic abortion
Sydney – death 
Helsinki – human experimentation and clinical trials

choices.text: Markings are seen on both Rifled projectile and Shotgun projectile
Marking help to confirm crime bullet
Primary markings are due to individual gun characteristics
Bullet fingerprinting involves testing for both primary and secondary markings

questions.text: Which of the following is true regarding ‘Markings on a projectile’
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (D)

Markings are due to the presence of rifling in rifled firearms. Comparison of crime and test bullet for marking helps to identify the weapon used for committing the crime.

questions.text: Gas is seen in the great vessels of the dead born fetus in how much time of death
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (D)

Roberts sign is the presence of gas in the great vessels which is seen in 12 hours of intrauterine death.

questions.text: A person residing in West Bengal presents with sensorimotor neuropathy, repeated infections and alopecia. The possible cause could be
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (B)

Ganga Brahmaputra valley has rich deposits of Arsenic and hence the poisoning is commonly seen in people in this region.

questions.text: Which acid does not cause coagulative necrosis
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (C)

HF is the only acid which does not cause coagulative necrosis

choices.text: Examination of skin using UV light
Examination of skin using IR light

questions.solution: Correct Answer (B)

questions.text: A patient presents with two puncture marks with multiple teeth marks on the forearm. He complains of vomiting, diplopia and breathing difficulty. What could be the possible diagnosis
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (C)

Neurological Symptoms in the patient suggest cobra bite.

questions.text: Which is not a stupefying agent
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (C)

Opium is a somniferous poison.

questions.text: Which test is not used in detection of Alcohol poisoning
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (D)

Marquis test is used to detect Opium poisoning.

questions.text: Ganja is obtained from
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (C)

Bhang is obtained from leaves of cannabis

questions.text: Which of the following is not a feature of LSD
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (A)

Amotivational syndrome is seen in cannabis poisoning

questions.text: What is not a feature of Acute Phosphorus poisoning
questions.solution:
Correct Answer (D)

Phossy jaw (Sinus of jaw) is seen chronic phosphorous poisoning.

questions.solution: Correct Answer (B)

questions.solution:
Correct Answer (B)
Tobacco is a cardiac poison. Treatment of choice is Mecamylamine
